features: ✅Save up Desktop Space:LENRUE A4 computer speaker is simple and elegant designed,one single usb-powered Basic speaker with single vertial shape, not a pair PC speakers,that to save more desktop space.Speaker size:L3"*D4"*H7.
✅Crystal Clear Sound:The Single USB Computer Speaker equipped with 5W full-range driver to create crystal clear sound . It is a good sound amplifier for basic desktop computers or laptops.
✅Avoid Messy Cables: Only one cable for transmitting both audio and power to the computer speaker,and the cable is 47.2" Length.
✅Easy to Control: All in one button on the front of the laptop speaker, you can easily turn on/off the speaker, adjust the volume just by rotating the knob.
✅Wide Compatibility: The USB Computer speaker can work greatly for Windows PCs, Desktop Computers, macOS MacBook, Mac mini and Chromebooks.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 28 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) Q: What's the problem if the speaker still “Doesn't Work” after plugged in? A1: Make sure that the USB port of your computer can work properly. A2: Make sure that you had selected "Speaker(A4)" as your computer playback device. Q: After plug USB in, there comes out a random popping noise from the speaker, how to deal with the problem? A: Plug the USB into the back of your desktop computer instead of front and make sure that the USB port of your computer can work properly. Q: Is it compatible with Android TX-Box, TV, Projector, Xbox and Play Station? A: No. the electric power of the USB port of these devices is too low to powered our USB speakers. Q: Is there a built-in microphone? A: No. There is no built-in mic, but the speaker has 3.5mm microphone and earphone port in the front of the speaker ,so you can easily to connect a separate computer microphone when having video calls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plug it in.... Installed!
reviews.reviewText: Plug into a USB "A" port, and it works .... Doesn't get any easier! .... Comes with an adapter USB "C" to accommodate more users .... (Very thoughtful manufacturer ... thumbs up)Front has a rotary dial to adjust sound Up or Down, levels ... Beside Knob is a mic PORT, and a Headphone PORT, handy for those externals to plug & play ... Bottom has 4 felt dots for surface protection from scratches .... Wire comes out of Back, bottom area, which some Users like to know .... Has a Single Amplifier inside the box frame ... Simple design, takes up a small amount of space on desk or shelvingDimensions: 3 wide x 4 deep counting Knob protrusion x 7 inches tall .... Cord is 47 inches, to reach around things ... Has a BLUE LIGHT when on, my ONLY con to this Speaker ... Originally, the shelf it was on, has that BRIGHT BLUE Light glaring at my eyes, so I had to move it right beside my laptop .... When turned off, no lightSound is incredible for such a small, entry level Speaker ... Plays Loud, Clear, good Bass on Music, fills the room wonderfully, and can hear it in the adjacent room, so I turned it down some ... Awesome price for a nice, well built, QUALITY Speaker ... Black goes with any decor .... Highly recommended ... A+++.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quick and Easy for audio boost
reviews.reviewText: Have an old laptop that is still good for browsing or watching streamed movies. The interior speakers, while stereo are barely functioning. The maximum audio level is very low. I was looking for an inexpensive and simply solution. Enter this speaker.Pros:- a single USB plug, cant be user than that- volume control knob- power thru USB, not tangled mess for AC power- lightweightCons:- when volume knob is used to turn volume very low, Windows reverts to internal speakers for output (not necessarily a bad thing)- its mono, not stereoProduct Packaging and Aesthetics:Simple design. Good feel on the knob. Maybe a white or grey color would be nice, but the black is also fineProduct Quality and Durability:My initial views on product quality and durability are:I am unable to comment, with personal experience, on long term quality and durability.Considering the material and construction, I feel that this speaker is reasonable quality. Given its price point, I am not expecting a Ferrari in quality. Its works.Using a scale of Poor, Average, and Excellent for product Quality and Durability.Personal Rating: averageProduct Value:This review is not explicitly about the cost, rather the personal value at that price point.At this time of this review this product was priced approximately $13. For a non-powers, mono speaker, I think this is a reasonable value. The cord is long enough. There is a knob to turn from zero to max. It would be nice to be a couple bucks cheaper, but it doesn't break the bankConsidering my own option on the value for this cost where Poor means its overpriced. Average means its priced appropriately. Excellent means its great value for the price.Personal Rating: (slightly below) averageProduce Origin:Made in ChinaConclusion: Is this a buy or a keep looking?Considering the build quality, the price, and the features, I think this is a BUY.Would I recommend this: YesDisclosure:This is my own personal Amazon Vine review. It is an honest and true account of my own views, opinions, reactions, expectations relating to this product. I did not purchase this product, however I was provided this product for the expressed purpose of providing a review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plug and play speaker, works great, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I have a home-made PC that has no internal speaker so I cannot hear any sounds, not even the notification warning sounds. I was looking for an inexpensive computer speaker just to have sound and ran across this inexpensive option. I was not looking for stereo sound or anything fancy. It just plugs in via USB and has a volume control - very simple. Turn the volume control counterclockwise all the way until it clicks and power is off with no sound. Turn it clockwise past the click to turn it on then you adjust the volume level with the knob.Sound is pretty decent and is can get fairly loud so this could be a good speaker for a small conference room presentation. I love that it does not require any power adapter or anything extra - just plug in the USB cable and it supplies the power and the data feed for the sound.Perfect for my use and is a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Its single speaker design saves space, making it perfect for compact office desks. Additionally, its small size ensures it won't obstruct the view of the monitor.The speaker delivers excellent sound quality, with clear and bright audio, ideal for listening to pop music and watching movies. While the bass effect may be weaker compared to larger speakers, it's sufficient for most users.With ample volume output, it easily meets daily usage needs.Using the speaker is straightforward—simply plug it into the computer's USB port without the need for driver installation. It features a built-in volume control knob for convenient adjustment. Moreover, it draws power and audio from a single USB interface, eliminating the need for an extra power cord.It boasts excellent compatibility, supporting various operating systems such as Windows, Mac, and Linux.However, it lacks additional interfaces, limiting its connectivity to other devices.
